fields.description: The specific sub-set of copyrights requested
The copyright string from the Knowledge Base, if this copyright is from that source
The user-updated copyright string. If it has not been updated and/or was not locally created, this will match kbCopyright.
A set of hashes of the files found that contained this copyright string
Whether the copyright is active or not
The source of the copyright string.
The time at which the copyright was last updated locally, if it has been modified
The name of the user who last updated the copyright string locally, if it has been modified
Meta data associated with the representation, as described in <<metadata,Meta Data>>
Meta data associated with the representation, as described in <<metadata,Meta Data>>
The total number of elements available in the result set
